title: Kate Moss looks radiant as she goes for lunch with pal DJ Fat Tony at Laylow in London
text:
She's one of the world's top supermodels, having burst onto the scene in the early 1990s.

And Kate Moss looked radiant as ever as she went for lunch with her longtime friend DJ Fat Tony at celebrity hotspot Laylow in London on Wednesday.

The model, 45, cut a stylish figure for the day, donning a black leather jacket along with a smaller khaki jacket underneath.

Out and about: Kate Moss, 45, looked radiant as ever as she went for lunch with her longtime friend DJ Fat Tony at celebrity hotspot Laylow in London on Wednesday

The Croydon native also sported a pair of black skinny jeans and added height to her frame with matching ankle boots.

Letting her blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders, Kate donned a large pair of shades and completed her look for the day with a black handbag.

Looking in high spirits as she stepped out of a car, Kate carried a small bouquet of flowers in her hand as she met her friend.

Fat Tony, whose real name is Tony Monarch, was dressed casually for the day in a white jacket with green and red stripes which he paired with matching trainers and camel trousers.

Fashion: The model cut a stylish figure for the day, donning a black leather jacket along with a smaller khaki jacket underneath

Kate's outing comes as it was reported by The Sun that she is planning to launch her own London-based fashion label to rival Victoria Beckham's.

A source claimed that the fashion favourite is planning to have daughter Lila Grace, 16, as the face of her brand, five years after releasing her final collaboration with Topshop.

The source said: 'Kate's label is called Rockeens and this is her Victoria Beckham move.

Looking in high spirits as she stepped out of a car, Kate carried a small bouquet of flowers in her hand as she met Fat Tony, whose real name is Tony Monarch

Style: Kate also sported a pair of black skinny jeans and added height to her frame with matching ankle boots

Letting her blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders, Kate donned a large pair of shades and completed her look for the day with a black handbag

'It's mostly rock-inspired silk dresses and leather jackets - basically her 'look' and aimed mass market so everyone can buy it.

'She's involved in the designing but just not the technical side. Lila Grace will be the face of it and it's due out before Christmas.'

The supermodel is said to have recently become more focused on her health and living a clean-cut lifestyle.

Pals: Fat Tony was dressed casually for the day in a white jacket with green and red stripes which he paired with matching trainers and camel trousers

Career: Kate's outing comes as it was reported by The Sun that she is planning to launch her own London-based fashion label to rival Victoria Beckham's

A source told The Sun on Sunday: 'Kate is like a new woman and a much better version of herself. She is focused, professional and glowing with health.

'Everyone is amazed at how well she has done in not drinking for a whole year, considering what she used to be like. But she has found it easier as time has gone on.'

Known for her party-girl days, mother-of-one Kate said she's more concerned with looking after herself these days.

She said: 'I’ve learned to take care of myself a bit more. I do yoga every day. I don’t go out nearly as much. And I take care of my skin, which somehow has held up.'
description: The model, 45, cut a stylish figure as she went for lunch at celebrity hotspot Laylow on Wednesday.
